lead_paragraph: The mayor signed a brief urging the Supreme Court to allow the president’s plan to go forward, saying that millions of New Yorkers would be affected.

headline.print_headline: Mayor Signs Brief Backing Obama’s Plan on Migrants
headline.main: De Blasio Signs Brief Defending Obama’s Immigration Overhaul

snippet: The mayor signed a brief urging the Supreme Court to allow the president’s plan to go forward, saying that millions of New Yorkers would be affected.
abstract: Mayor Bill de Blasio joins 100 mayors and county leaders in signing amicus brief to be filed in Supreme Court immigration case United States v Texas; brief urges forward movement on Pres Obama’s executive action on immigration; de Blasio says action, which gives temporary legal status to some undocumented immigrants, will directly impact 220,000 New Yorkers.
